source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_00<tab>Alphinaud seems eager to share his theory.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_00<tab>Альфино не терпится поделиться своей теорией.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_01<tab>Before unveiling his grand theory, Alphinaud would adjourn to a more appropriate location─specifically, the southern shore of Loch Seld.

TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_02<tab>After favoring you with a short lecture on the history of Loch Seld, Alphinaud posits that the “darkness beneath the palace” referred to by Ernold may contain the submerged remnants of the ancient city of Skalla. He further theorizes that Theodoric had his kinsmen cursed and cast into the depths not only to punish them for their imagined crimes, but to have them serve as guardians over his treasures. Whilst Alphinaud and Arenvald search for a way into the ruins from above, you are to scour the loch bed for an underwater entrance.
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_03<tab>In the frigid waters of Loch Seld, you discover a passage leading directly beneath the palace foundations. Such a find warrants further investigation...

TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_04<tab>You have discovered a stone door which appears to offer a way into the ruins beneath the palace. Enter the Drowned City of Skalla, and search for the mad king's trove!

※Challenge the Drowned City of Skalla with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.
target:
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_04<tab>You have discovered a stone door which appears to offer a way into the ruins beneath the palace. Enter the Drowned City of Skalla, and search for the mad king's trove!

※Challenge the Drowned City of Skalla with other players via the Duty Finder, or with a party of NPCs via Duty Support. Both systems are accessible from the main menu as well as the dungeon's entrance point.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_05<tab>You have defeated the monstrous denizens of Skalla. The fabled treasure must surely lie nearby...

TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_06<tab>Having braved the Drowned City's death-filled halls, you finally gaze upon the riches of the mad king's trove. Return to the Ala Mhigan Quarter, and recount the adventure with your comrades.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_06<tab>Having braved the Drowned City's death-filled halls, you finally gaze upon the riches of the mad king's trove. Return to the Ala Mhigan Quarter, and recount the adventure with your comrades.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_07<tab>Alphinaud expresses his admiration for your adventuring prowess, to which he attributes your success in the underground foray. Arenvald, meanwhile, seems more intent on teasing Alphinaud for his reaction to the ruins' ghostly inhabitants...
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SEQ_07<tab>Alphinaud expresses his admiration for your adventuring prowess, to which he attributes your success in the underground foray. Arenvald, meanwhile, seems more intent on teasing Alphinaud for his reaction to the ruins' ghostly inhabitants...

TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alphinaud on the southern shore of Loch Seld.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_00<tab>Поговорите с Альфино на южном берегу Глубины.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_01<tab>Search the ruins on the loch floor.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_01<tab>Отыщите руины на дне озера.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_02<tab>Investigate the passage.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_02<tab>Исследуйте проход.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_03<tab>Enter the Drowned City of Skalla.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_03<tab>Войдите в Затопленный город Скалла.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_04<tab>Enter the Drowned City of Skalla.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_04<tab>Войдите в Затопленный город Скалла.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Alphinaud in the Ala Mhigan Quarter.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_05<tab>Поговорите с Альфино в жилом квартале Ала Миго.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_001<tab>...Well? Out with it! What's this theory of yours?
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_001<tab>Ну? Выкладывайте! Что за теория?

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>...Actually, mayhap it would be better if we first adjourned to a more suitable location.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Вообще то, лучше бы нам сначала переместиться в более подходящее место.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_011<tab>...In case a rival treasure hunter overhears our plans, you mean? Good thinking!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_011<tab>Чтобы охотники за сокровищами не подслушали нас? Отличная мысль!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>That...was not exactly the reason, but 'tis certainly a valid concern. Let us reconvene on the southern edge of Loch Seld.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>На самом деле не поэтому, но звучит разумно... Давайте встретимся на южном берегу Глубины.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_015<tab>Come now, Alphinaud, don't leave us in suspense! Let's hear this theory of yours!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_015<tab>Ну давайте, Альфино, не томите! Расскажите эту свою теорию!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Forgive me. 'Twas not my intention to draw out proceedings. I simply wished to have the loch in sight while I explained things.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_020<tab>Прошу прощения. Я не хотел так затягивать, просто с озером будет нагляднее.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Prior to the great flood of the Sixth Umbral Calamity, the salt lakes you see before you were yet dry ravines. And this, believe it or not, was the site of the ancient city of Skalla, which rose and fell during the Fifth Astral Era.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_021<tab>Ещё до великого потопа Шестого Умбрального Катаклизма, солёные озёра вроде этого были обычными ямами. И в ней, хотите верьте хотите нет, находился древний город Скалла, который был воздвигнут и разрушен в течении Пятой Астральной эры.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>From what we know of the period, the city was already deserted by the time the waters began to rise, having been all but destroyed by war. Yet its ruins remain to this day at the bottom of Loch Seld.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_022<tab>Исходя из наших знаний об этом периоде... к тому времени, когда вода начала подниматься, город уже опустел после продолжительной войны. Его руины покоятся на дне Глубины и по сей день.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_023<tab>It is my belief that the “darkness beneath the palace” mentioned by Theodoric's former scribe was not a reference to the prison, but to a place still further below: the ruins of Skalla.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_023<tab>Моя теория заключается в том, что когда писарь говорил о «тьме под дворцом», он имел в виду не тюрьму, а те самые руины Скаллы.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_024<tab>I further surmise that the mad king's unfortunate kinsmen were cast down there not simply out of a desire to punish them, but to discourage exploration. Theodoric wanted to keep the ruins secure...
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_024<tab>Я также предполагаю, что несчастные родственники Безумного Короля были брошены туда не просто в качестве наказания, но и для того, чтобы воспрепятствовать исследованиям. Теодорик хотел защитить руины...

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_025<tab>Wait...you're saying...they were meant to guard the mad king's trove!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_025<tab>Постойте... то есть вы хотите сказать, те монстры охраняют... сокровищницу?!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_026<tab>Precisely. And since we know the court thaumaturge was involved, we can safely assume that any entrance into the old city will have been magically concealed.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_026<tab>Именно. И раз уж мы знаем, что там был замешан оккультист, наверняка вход в старый город был магически запечатан.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_027<tab>...Which would explain how a legion of imperial soldiers and the gods know how many Ala Mhigans never found a trace of the trove.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_027<tab>Что объяснило бы, почему ни легион имперских солдат, ни целая куча жителей Ала Миго так до сих пор и не нашли её.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_028<tab>We, however, have certain advantages which they did not enjoy. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─would you be so good as to swim down to the bottom of the loch and search for an underwater route into the ruins? While you do that, Arenvald and I will seek out an ensorcelled portal within the palace.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_028<tab>Однако мы располагаем возможностями, недоступными им. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> — не <var 08 E905 ((могла)) ((мог)) /var> бы ты нырнуть туда и поискать подводный путь в руины? А мы с Аренвальдом тем временем поищем запечатанный проход во дворце.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You discover a passage that appears to lead under the palace foundations. Press on, and find out where it goes.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>Вы обнаружили проход, который ведёт под фундамент замка. Продолжайте осмотр и узнайте, куда он ведёт.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>You come to a worn stone door, standing temptingly ajar. It would appear you have found an entrance into the subterranean ruins.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Вы прибыли к соблазнительно приоткрытой древней каменной двери. Судя по всему, вы обнаружили вход в подземные руины...

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>(-Alphinaud's Voice-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─it's Alphinaud. We have searched the prison beneath the palace, and found a teleportation portal concealed by enchantments. The markings indicate it leads to an underground cavern.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_041<tab>(-Alphinaud's Voice-)<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─it's Alphinaud. We have searched the prison beneath the palace, and found a teleportation portal concealed by enchantments. The markings indicate it leads to an underground cavern.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_100_041<tab>(-Alphinaud's Voice-)What news on your end?
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_100_041<tab>(-Alphinaud's Voice-)What news on your end?

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>(-Alphinaud's Voice-)...And you believe it leads into the ruins? Then I daresay we will be able to meet within. Go on and head through the door.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_042<tab>(-Alphinaud's Voice-)...And you believe it leads into the ruins? Then I daresay we will be able to meet within. Go on and head through the door.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_043<tab>(-Arenvald's Voice-)By the way, I took the liberty of calling on a friend for help. I guarantee she's both dependable <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> discreet. We'll see you soon!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_043<tab>(-Arenvald's Voice-)By the way, I took the liberty of calling on a friend for help. I guarantee she's both dependable <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> discreet. We'll see you soon!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_050<tab>Gods, but what a dark and treacherous trek that was, with abominations waiting for us at every turn... In other words, it was a proper adventure!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_050<tab>Gods, but what a dark and treacherous trek that was, with abominations waiting for us at every turn... In other words, it was a proper adventure!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Arenvald and I tried to do our fair share, but I fear you ended up bearing the bulk of the burden as usual. You truly led the way with your adventuring prowess, my friend.
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_060<tab>Arenvald and I tried to do our fair share, but I fear you ended up bearing the bulk of the burden as usual. You truly led the way with your adventuring prowess, my friend.

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_061<tab>Aye, without your help, I reckon we'd still be fumbling about in the dark. I'm glad I called on you!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_061<tab>Aye, without your help, I reckon we'd still be fumbling about in the dark. I'm glad I called on you!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>I must say, I am still reeling at the sight of that mountain of riches...
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_062<tab>I must say, I am still reeling at the sight of that mountain of riches...

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_063<tab>What, like how you reeled at the sight of that floating specter, you mean? I wish you could've seen the look on your own face, Alphinaud!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ARENVALD_000_063<tab>What, like how you reeled at the sight of that floating specter, you mean? I wish you could've seen the look on your own face, Alphinaud!

source: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_064<tab>M-Must we dwell on such momentary lapses!? We found the mad king's trove, and that is all that matters!
target: TEXT_STMBDB103_02964_ALPHINAUD_000_064<tab>M-Must we dwell on such momentary lapses!? We found the mad king's trove, and that is all that matters!
